translation: I see You without beginning, middle, or end, infinite in power, with endless arms, the sun and moon as Your eyes, the burning fire Your mouth, heating the entire universe with Your radiance.
commentary: 11.19 Anadimadhyantam without beginning? middle or end? Anantaviryam infinite in power? Anantabahum of endless arms? Shashisuryanetra Thy eyes as the sun and the moon? I see (I) see? You Thee? Thy mouth as the burning fire? Svatejasa with Thy radiance? Visvam the universe? This is this? Tapantam heating.Commentary Anantabahu Having endless arms. This denotes that the multiplicity of His limbs is endless.
